mapper.insert: insert into topic(topic_id, author_id, title, content, create_time) value (#{topicId}, #{authorId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createTime});
mapper.select: select topic_id, author_id, username as author, title, content, create_time from topic inner join user on user.uuid = topic.author_id where topic_id = #{topicId};
select topic_id, username as author, title, create_time from topic inner join user on user.uuid = topic.author_id order by create_time desc limit #{offset}, #{rows};
